name: Dragon Fire (itch) (introtogamesproduction)
description:
Dragon island has been taken over by evil Griffins, Harpies and Daemons, this battle in the sky will be the ultimate decided to see who has the rightful claim to this beautiful place. 

Play as a fierce Dragon in this top down shooter game. You must destroy as many enemies as possible and evade asteroids and enemies. 

What will you're score be, how long can you last?
